function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate credit guarantee ratio in a recession","Impact":"SMEs face more difficulty accessing finance, leading to potential business closures and job losses","Mitigation":"Increase the guarantee ratio to ensure SMEs have access to necessary finance during economic downturns","Technologies":"Economic modeling and policy adjustments","People":"SMEs, banks, government policymakers","Owner":"Government policymakers, central banks, financial regulators"},{"Description":"Lack of data for all ASEAN Member States","Impact":"Limited generalizability of the study's findings to the entire ASEAN region","Mitigation":"Seek to obtain data from additional member states to enhance the study's scope and relevance","Technologies":"Data collection and analysis tools, international collaboration","People":"Researchers, governmental organizations, statistical agencies","Owner":"Researchers, international organizations, statistical agencies"},{"Description":"Novelty of the study","Impact":"Limited existing literature for comparison and validation of the study's findings","Mitigation":"Ensure robust data collection and rigorous analysis to support the credibility of the study's conclusions","Technologies":"Statistical analysis tools, peer review processes","People":"Researchers, academic community","Owner":"Researchers, academic institutions"}]}
